mapper.select: select user_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_profile_image, user_disabled, user_teacher, user_created_date, user_updated_date from online_users where user_email = #{value}
select user_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_profile_image, user_disabled, user_teacher, user_created_date, user_updated_date from online_users where user_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into online_users (user_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_profile_image) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{profileImage})
mapper.update: update online_users set user_password = #{password}, user_name = #{name}, user_phone = #{phone}, user_profile_image = #{profileImage}, user_disabled = #{disabled}, user_teacher = #{teacher}, user_updated_date = sysdate where user_id = #{id}
